title: Madhya Pradesh Leisure Tour 4
overview: Explore the beautiful leisure attractions of Madhya Pradesh. This tour is designed to give you an immersive experience of Leisure Spot 4.

itinerary.title: Arrival
itinerary.desc: Arrive in Madhya Pradesh and transfer to your hotel.

itinerary.title: Sightseeing
itinerary.desc: Full day exploring Leisure Spot 4 and nearby areas.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.desc: Breakfast and transfer to the airport/station.
